TFGCo Go Protobuf definitions
=============================

This package contains the common .proto files and related generated code we use in our projects.


### Changelog
#### v1.0.0

* Maestro
  * Grpc events proto and golang generated file

#### v1.1.0

* Maestro
  * Added SendRoomInfo
  * Added SendRoomEvent
